title: My Robot Wiper
description:
My Robot Wiper, it’s easy and fun!

My Robot Wiper is specifically created for Wiper Robot customers, to let them have a useful and fun experience with their lawn mower.

EASY SETTING – easily set up all the settings directly from your smartphone. (Now available only for the model Yard L400)

HAVE FUN – drive Wiper Robot manually through your garden and play with your family and friends!

BE UPDATED – stay tuned with the latest updates and upgrade your Wiper Robot directly through your app.

** IMPORTANT **
The Update function is not available for all mower.
descriptionHTML:
My Robot Wiper, it’s easy and fun!

My Robot Wiper is specifically created for Wiper Robot customers, to let them have a useful and fun experience with their lawn mower.

EASY SETTING – easily set up all the settings directly from your smartphone. (Now available only for the model Yard L400)

HAVE FUN – drive Wiper Robot manually through your garden and play with your family and friends!

BE UPDATED – stay tuned with the latest updates and upgrade your Wiper Robot directly through your app.

** IMPORTANT **
The Update function is not available for all mower.
